Through Jesus the fallen sons of Adam become \93sons of God.\94 \93Both he that sanctifieth and they that are sanctified are all of one; for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren.\94 [Hebrews 2:11.] The Christian's life should be one of faith, of victory, and joy in God. \93Whatsoever is born of God overcometh the world; and this is the victory that overcometh 
478
the world, even our faith.\94 [1 John 5:4.] Truly spake God's servant Nehemiah, \93The joy of the Lord is your strength.\94 [Nehemiah 8:10.] And says Paul: \93Rejoice in the Lord alway; and again I say, Rejoice.\94 \93Rejoice evermore. Pray without ceasing. In everything give thanks; for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.\94 [Philippians 4:4; 1 Thessalonians 5:16-18.]
